snippet: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs criticized a Pentagon report that accused China’s military of cyberattacks on the American government and military contractors.
abstract: China's Ministry of Foreign Affairs criticizes Pentagon report that explicitly accuses China’s military of staging attacks on computer systems of American government and military contractors.

byline.contributor: Chris Buckley contributed reporting from Hong Kong, and Patrick Zuo contributed research from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs criticized a Pentagon report that accused China’s military of cyberattacks on the American government and military contractors.

headline.seo: China Criticizes Pentagon Report on Cyberattacks
headline.main: China Blasts Hacking Claim by Pentagon
headline.print_headline: China Blasts Hacking Claim By Pentagon
